title: Vertical or Horizontal Reflection?
text: If reflected vertically, is it a horizontal reflection or a vertical reflection?

title: Where to put the negative sign
text: Think about if $$x$$ values will become negative or $$y$$ values will become negative from the reflection across the $$x$$ axis.

title: Point Reflection
text: Think about a point $$(2,3)$$. If it it reflected vertically, what does the $$y$$ value become?
